name: Zorn
description:
Take control of Zorn, one of the last survivors of humanity. Explore the ruined remains of what was once Johannesburg's finest varsity institute.

All assets were made as 2D concepts then developed in 3D for the Unity Game Engine.

See development and other assets on this artstation link
https://artstn.co/p/qA289L

www.facebook.com/artymusoke

Music soundtrack
Tom Day - Future Holds
